# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  bug_1040_son.cir bug_1040_son.cir.sh rc_discharge_diode_noop.net rc_discharge_diode_op.net DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_1040_son.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1040_SON/bug_1040_son.cir.sh COMMAND ${PERL_BIN} -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bug_1040_son.cir.sh ${XYCE_BINARY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug_1040_son.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_1040_SON/bug_1040_son.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1040_SON/bug_1040_son.cir.sh PROPERTY ATTACHED_FILES_ON_FAIL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_1040_son.cir.err )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1040_SON/bug_1040_son.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;capacitor;diode")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1040_SON/bug_1040_son.cir.sh COMMAND ${PERL_BIN} -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bug_1040_son.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 ${XYCE_BINARY}" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug_1040_son.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_1040_SON/bug_1040_son.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1040_SON/bug_1040_son.cir.sh PROPERTY ATTACHED_FILES_ON_FAIL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_1040_son.cir.err )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1040_SON/bug_1040_son.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;capacitor;diode")
endif()
